item.title: Chris add a quote by Daniel H. Wilson
item.description: "It's hard to wipe your eyes when you have whirring buzzsaws for hands." -- Daniel H. Wilson

item.title: Chris add a quote by David Halberstam
item.description: "Fear was the terrible secret of the battlefiled and could afflict the brave as well as the timid. Worse it was contagious, and could destroy a unit before a battle even began. Because of that, commanders were first and foremost in the fear suppression business." -- David Halberstam

item.title: Chris add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Where does contagion end and art begin?" -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Chris add a quote by Dan Allen
item.description: "With great power often comes great confusion." -- Dan Allen

item.title: Chris add a quote by Jon Stewart
item.description: "Why did the Articles [of Confederation] fail so completely? Most historians believe the founding fathers spent a great deal of their first constitutional convention drafting the delaration of independence and only realized on July 3rd the Articles were also due." -- Jon Stewart

item.title: Chris add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "I don't want whatever I want. Nobody does. Not really. What kind of fun would it be if I just got everything I ever wanted just like that, and it didn't mean anything? What then?" -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Chris add a quote by Obert Skye
item.description: "He came into the world like a delivery that no one knew what to do with, and nobody wanted to sign for." -- Obert Skye

item.title: Chris add a quote by Obert Skye
item.description: "There are some things your mind has been hiding from you." -- Obert Skye

item.title: Chris add a quote by George Orwell
Chris add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "[She wasn't] a logically reasoning woman, but God is good, and hearts may count in heaven as high as heads." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Chris add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "If it is ones lot to be cast among fools, one must learn foolishness.-The Count of Monte Cristo" -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Chris add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Some people never go crazy. What truly horrible lives they must lead." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Chris add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description:
"Do you hate people?
I don't hate them...I just feel better when they're not around." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Chris add a quote by Robert Harris
item.description: "Power brings a man many luxuries, but a clean pair of hands is seldom among them." -- Robert Harris
